mapper.sql: a.VOIPFLOW_ID AS voipflowId,a.MESSAGE_NO AS messageNo,a.MESSAGE_NAME AS messageName,a.INTERFERE_TYPE AS interfereType, a.INTERFERE_DIR AS interfereDir,a.R_STARTTIME AS rStartTime,a.R_ENDTIME AS rEndTime,a.C_TIME AS cTime,a.OPERATE_TYPE AS operationType, a.CREATE_OPER AS createOper,a.MODIFY_OPER AS modifyOper,a.CREATE_TIME AS createTime,a.MODIFY_TIME AS modifyTime

a.VOIPFLOW_ID AS voipflowId,a.MESSAGE_NO AS messageNo,a.MESSAGE_NAME AS messageName,a.INTERFERE_TYPE AS interfereType, a.INTERFERE_DIR AS interfereDir,a.R_STARTTIME AS rStartTime,a.R_ENDTIME AS rEndTime,a.C_TIME AS cTime,a.OPERATE_TYPE AS operationType, a.CREATE_OPER AS createOper,a.MODIFY_OPER AS modifyOper,a.CREATE_TIME AS createTime,a.MODIFY_TIME AS modifyTime, b.user_type AS userType,b.user_names AS userNames,b.user_groupIds AS userGroupIds, c.gw_ips AS gwIp, c.gw_keeperips AS gwKeeperIp
mapper.select:
select
from zf_v2_voipflow_manage a INNER JOIN (SELECT VOIPFLOW_ID,user_type,group_concat(USER_NAME) AS user_names, group_concat(USER_GROUP_ID) AS user_groupIds FROM zf_v2_voipflow_manage_usergroup GROUP BY VOIPFLOW_ID) b ON a.VOIPFLOW_ID = b.VOIPFLOW_ID INNER JOIN (select tmp.VOIPFLOW_ID,group_concat(tmp.gw_ips) AS gw_ips,group_concat(tmp.gw_keeperips) AS gw_keeperips from (select VOIPFLOW_ID, if (VOIP_TYPE=0,group_concat(VOIP_IP),'') AS gw_ips, if (VOIP_TYPE=1,group_concat(VOIP_IP),'') AS gw_keeperips from zf_v2_voipflow_manage_ip group BY VOIPFLOW_ID,VOIP_TYPE ) tmp group BY VOIPFLOW_ID) c ON a.VOIPFLOW_ID = c.VOIPFLOW_ID WHERE a.VOIPFLOW_ID = #{voipFlowId}

select
from zf_v2_voipflow_manage a INNER JOIN (SELECT VOIPFLOW_ID,user_type,group_concat(USER_NAME) AS user_names, group_concat(USER_GROUP_ID) AS user_groupIds FROM zf_v2_voipflow_manage_usergroup GROUP BY VOIPFLOW_ID) b ON a.VOIPFLOW_ID = b.VOIPFLOW_ID INNER JOIN (select tmp.VOIPFLOW_ID,group_concat(tmp.gw_ips) AS gw_ips,group_concat(tmp.gw_keeperips) AS gw_keeperips from (select VOIPFLOW_ID, if (VOIP_TYPE=0,group_concat(VOIP_IP),'') AS gw_ips, if (VOIP_TYPE=1,group_concat(VOIP_IP),'') AS gw_keeperips from zf_v2_voipflow_manage_ip group BY VOIPFLOW_ID,VOIP_TYPE ) tmp group BY VOIPFLOW_ID) c ON a.VOIPFLOW_ID = c.VOIPFLOW_ID
mapper.insert:
insert into zf_v2_voipflow_manage
MESSAGE_NO,
MESSAGE_NAME,
INTERFERE_TYPE,
INTERFERE_DIR,
R_STARTTIME,
R_ENDTIME,
C_TIME,
OPERATE_TYPE,
CREATE_OPER,
MODIFY_OPER,
CREATE_TIME,
MODIFY_TIME,
#{messageNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{messageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{interfereType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{interfereDir,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{rStartTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{rEndTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{cTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

#{createOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifyOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
UPDATE zf_v2_voipflow_manage
MESSAGE_NO = #{messageNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MESSAGE_NAME = #{messageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERFERE_TYPE = #{interfereType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INTERFERE_DIR = #{interfereDir,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
R_STARTTIME = #{rStartTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
R_ENDTIME = #{rEndTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OPERATE_TYPE = #{operationType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_OPER = #{createOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_OPER = #{modifyOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where VOIPFLOW_ID = #{voipFlowId}
